NotificationGenericError.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

NotificationUploadAttachmentError.message: Error uploading attachment. Please check your internet connection.
NotificationUploadAttachmentError.description: Notification when there is an error uploading an attachment.

NotificationNoMessageSelected.message: No email selected. Please open an email.
NotificationNoMessageSelected.description: Notification when no email is selected.

NotificationNoEmailContent.description: Notification when email content cannot be retrieved.

NotificationGitlabSettingsMissing.message: GitLab settings are missing. Please configure them in the settings.
NotificationGitlabSettingsMissing.description: Notification when GitLab settings are missing.

NotificationGitLabUrlNotConfigured.message: GitLab URL is not configured. Please set it in the settings.
NotificationGitLabUrlNotConfigured.description: Notification when GitLab URL is not configured.

NotificationGitLabTokenNotConfigured.message: GitLab token is not configured. Please set it in the settings.
NotificationGitLabTokenNotConfigured.description: Notification when GitLab token is not configured.

NotificationInvalidGitLabToken.message: Invalid GitLab token. Please check your settings.
NotificationInvalidGitLabToken.description: Notification when GitLab token is invalid.

NotificationNoGitlabSettings.message: GitLab settings are not set. Please configure them in the settings.
NotificationNoGitlabSettings.description: Notification when no GitLab settings are set.

NotificationIssueCreated.message: Issue created successfully! Click to open.
NotificationIssueCreated.description: Notification when issue is successfully created.

NotificationNoProjectSelected.description: Notification when an invalid project is selected.

NotificationAttachmentNotFound.message: Attachment not found. Issue creation aborted.
NotificationAttachmentNotFound.description: Notification when an attachment is not found.
